entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
